text: Valériy Khmelkó (30 July 1939 – 30 October 2021) was a Ukrainian sociologist. He was a professor at the National University of Kiev-Mohyla Academy. He was also President of the Kyiv International Institute of Sociology. Khmelko was born in Kyiv, Ukraine. His works focused on macrosociology and sociology of personality.В. Паниотто.
